insert into COMM.CLINIC_ITEM_DICT
ITEM_CLASS,
ITEM_CODE,
ITEM_NAME,
INPUT_CODE,

ITEM_DATAWIN,

mapper.update:
update COMM.CLINIC_ITEM_DICT
ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INPUT_CODE = #{inputCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTOPRINT_FLAG = #{autoprintFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_DATAWIN = #{itemDatawin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ITEM_CLASS = #{itemClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
